Hello!

My name is Waseem Suleman and I am a computer scientist.
I experiment with web technologies and functional programming languages such as Haskell. I also take interest in computer game programming and mobile devices.

Although I have other interests such as boxing and swimming, most of my blog posts will focus on my technological interests.

Please check the about page to learn a bit more about me.
